title: UFO Princess Valkyrie 4: Toki to Yume to Ginga no Utage (Dub)
alternative_title: UFO Ultramaiden Valkyrie 4: Banquet of Time; Dreams; and Galaxies; UFO Princess Walküre 4; UFO Princess Walküre: Toki to Yume to Ginga no Utage; UFO Princess Warukyure: Toki to Yume to Ginga no Utage; 円盤皇女ワるきゅーレ 時と夢と銀河の宴
description: The strange and magical events of the last season have left Kazuto with two Valkyries. He now finds himself living with and looking after both a teenaged-princess Valkyrie, as well as the child-princess Valkyrie! And they still have not yet gotten married...
